title: Biden Tests Negative for Covid-19 After Close Contact With Staffer Who Contracted Virus
sub_head: The president spent time on Air Force One last week with a midlevel aide who later tested positive
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Biden tested negative for Covid-19 on Wednesday, the White House said, after he came into close contact with a midlevel staffer who contracted the virus.
Mr. Biden took a PCR test on Wednesday shortly before a meeting with cabinet members and business leaders on supply chain issues.
